nodes.bodyText:
This is fancy and the end result is:
If we have only one item in bodyParams use:
bodyParams = ParamA

If we have multiple bodyParams we get:
bodyParams. = [:]  # empty map in Groovy
bodyParams.put("ParamA", ParamA
bodyParams.put("ParamB", ParamB
I think other client generators do not support multiple body parameters so as long as the single body parameter use case works fine, I think that should be good enough.
Good point. I updated the template to only use bodyParam.
